it.polimi.se2018.model

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the game board for a game that contains all the information of the game. Any variation must go through this class to be sure of the reliability of the game data.
    Author:
    Luca Genoni

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer(int indexPlayerEnded)
                throws GameIsBlockedException,
                       CurrentPlayerException,
                       GameIsOverException,
                       FatalGameErrorException,
                       ValueDiceWrongException
        Method used t change the current player to the next and end the game. It check the state of the player for the first/second turn and move the dice in hand to the DicePool.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayerEnded - that request the move.
        Throws:
        GameIsBlockedException - if the game can't be modified.
        CurrentPlayerException - if the requester isn't the current player.
        GameIsOverException - if the game is over.
        FatalGameErrorException - if the game is corrupted.
        ValueDiceWrongException

      • calculatePoint

        public NodePodium calculatePoint(int indexPlayer)
        Method used to calculate point of the game.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player.
        Returns:
        NodePodium of the player.

      • calculateAllPoint

        public void calculateAllPoint()
        Method used to calculate all the point of the game.

      • setWindowOfPlayer

        public void setWindowOfPlayer(int indexPlayer,
                              int indexOfTheWindow)
                       throws WindowPatternAlreadyTakenException,
                              WindowSettingCompleteException,
                              ValueDiceWrongException
        Method used to set a window pattern.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player that set the window pattern.
        indexOfTheWindow - index of the winow pattern.
        Throws:
        WindowPatternAlreadyTakenException - if the window pattern is already taken.
        WindowSettingCompleteException - if the window pattern are over.
        ValueDiceWrongException - if the value of the dice is wrong for the game restriction.

      • addNewDiceToHandFromDicePool

        public void addNewDiceToHandFromDicePool(int indexPlayer,
                                         int indexDicePool)
                                  throws NoDiceException,
                                         GameIsBlockedException,
                                         CurrentPlayerException,
                                         AlreadyDrawANewDiceException
        Method used to add new dice to hand from dice pool
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - index of the player that request the move.
        indexDicePool - index of the dice chosen.
        Throws:
        NoDiceException - there is no dice in the selected position.
        GameIsBlockedException
        CurrentPlayerException
        AlreadyDrawANewDiceException

        public void setStopGame(boolean stopGame)

      • insertDice

        public void insertDice(int indexPlayer,
                       int row,
                       int column,
                       boolean firstTurnDie)
                throws GameException
        Method used to insert a normal dice in the window pattern card.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player.
        row - row of the window pattern card.
        column - column of the window pattern card.
        firstTurnDie - true if the turn is over, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        GameException - exception derivate from game restriction.

      • insertDice

        public void insertDice(int indexPlayer,
                       int row,
                       int column,
                       boolean adjacentRestriction,
                       boolean colorRestriction,
                       boolean valueRestriction,
                       boolean singleNewDice)
                throws GameException
        Method used to insert the dice on the window pattern.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player.
        row - index of the window's line
        column - index of the window's column
        adjacentRestriction - true if need to be near a dice, false otherwise
        colorRestriction - true if need to check this restriction
        valueRestriction - true if need to check this restriction
        singleNewDice - new dice.
        Throws:
        GameException - exception derivate from game restriction.

        Method used to roll a dice in hand.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player.
        Throws:
        GameException - exception derivate from game restriction.

        public void setValueDiceHand(int indexPlayer,
                             int value)
                      throws GameException
        Method used to set value of the dice in hand.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - ID of the player.
        value - value of the dice.
        Throws:

      • increaseOrDecrease

        public void increaseOrDecrease(int indexPlayer,
                               boolean increase)
                        throws GameIsBlockedException,
                               CurrentPlayerException,
                               ValueDiceWrongException,
                               NoDiceInHandException,
                               NoDiceException
        Method used to increase or decrease the value of the dice.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - integer that indicate which player send the request of
        increase - true of increase the value false for decrease
        Throws:
        GameIsBlockedException - if the game can't be access
        CurrentPlayerException - if it isn't the player's turn
        ValueDiceWrongException - if the request doesn't respect the dice domain
        NoDiceInHandException - if the player have no dice in hand
        NoDiceException - if there are no dice.
